item.description:
It's supposed to be a very nice day, particularly the afternoon. As much as I'd like to, I (Dave) cannot hit Sunday...however, Gopi recommended a Meetup and has volunteered to host.

As always, all levels welcome! If you can't show up at noon sharp, no big deal; just arrive when you can.

For those who haven't been, Dugger Park (five courts) is not far from the Tufts courts and you can Google Map the address above for directions.

If attending, please RSVP so Gopi will have a rough idea of how many courts will be needed.

If you don't know your "level," no problem.

If you do have an idea of your level though, please list it when you RSVP as it'll help Gopi group players of similar levels on courts.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for Gopi (see his profile pic).
item.name: (Supah Last-Minute) Tennis Sunday Afternoon
